author: .mardragon
content: I know it will sound like conspiracy theory but how likely it would be for Tether/Bitfinex guys to control Ethereum network because of PoS? How Ethereum could counter such possibility? Let's assume for sake of discussion on technical level that Tether/Bitfinex is scam and they were printing whatever numbers of USDT they wanted. They could accumulate a lot of ETH because of that. Like really a lot, enough to attack ETH2.0 PoS. Anyone raised this discussion in past?
